Name: Sirius A B
Notes:
Alhabor, Aschere, Canicula, the Dog Star; brightest star, 5th nearest star 
system; binary; suspected variable, *V*max = -1.46m, *V*min = -1.41m

Name: ε CMa
Notes:

Notes:

Name: η CMa
Notes: Aludra, part of Al ʽAdhārā or Al Adzari;[2][3] α Cyg variable

Name: ο2 CMa

Notes:

Name: τ CMa
Notes: member of the NGC 2362 star cluster; β Lyr variable

Name: 27 CMa

binary, component A spectroscopic binary, component B γ Cas variable, *V*max

Notes: γ Cas and λ Eri variable, *V*max = 5.33m, *V*min = 5.81m, *P* = 0.79187 d

Name: VY CMa
Notes:
